basics.name: Butch Mayhew
basics.summary: Seeking ways to execute on my personal leadership philosophy: To grow, inspire, and serve my team while seeking and implementing ways to push the business forward.

highlights: Hiring, growing, and leading Test Engineers, Test Managers, and Software Engineers in Test across multiple products
Building and growing an engineering culture that cares about quality
Identified and built out standard metrics around release quality, customer reported defects, and test automation
Building strategies around what and how to add test automation to our flagship products.
Involved in designing and building out our CI/CD pipelines
Influencing and Establishing healthy culture around: agile practices, high quality software, and teamwork
Leading remote teams both in the US and offshore.
Hiring, growing, and leading Software Engineers and Tester Engineers across multiple project teams
Serving as a technical lead working with product managers when scoping out the details of new product features
Work with product team to establish realistic delivery dates and project milestones
Influencing and Establishing healthy culture around: agile practices, high quality software, and teamwork
Leading remote teams both in the US and offshore.
Hired UI Software Engineers to build React front ends to our applications
Built and implemented a release management process to allow multiple teams to deliver code to production
Identified risks for upcoming development and infrastructure projects and worked with teams to mitigate as much as possible
Hired and trained 10 team members in this role across two different products
Transitioned to a company that we acquired and positively influenced the culture of quality across the development teams
Successfully implemented a Test Automation strategy and have made significant progress on API and UI frameworks
Worked with DevOps team to build out our CI/CD pipeline
Tested across many different products and product teams.
Implemented Test Automation Framework Ruby/Watir/Selenium.
Served as Scrum Master for delivery team.
Used exploratory testing to find defects in web application.
Managed code deployment processes.
Managed inbound call center.
Negotiated rates with vendors.
Managed warehouse fulfillment.
Provided technical training and documentation for team members.
Co-taught Introduction to Computer Science to High School students
Prepared lesson plans based on the provided curriculum
Graded students projects and provided helpful to the students

projects.description: Built Candidate Homework to assess a testers technical skills.
projects.name: New Test Engineer Candidate Homework
